topic.title: Dofus - Part 1: Julith (French Audio) (English Subs) (720p) (VP9+OPUS) (WEBRIP) OfuEncode
topic.body:
Painstakingly encoded on my dual core Athlon II X2 250 for almost three days for the best balance between low bitrate and no perceived quality loss from the source. (Dofus.Livre.1.2016.FRENCH.720p.WEBDL.h264-Bernd_Lauert.mkv)

Thanks goes out to Bernd_Lauert, the /coc/ subtitle guys and for /co/ for introducing me to the series in the first place back in 2008, and most of all, to Ankama for producing this wonderful universe, creating such great animation and telling these delightful stories.

Also available at https://www.nyaa.se/?page=view&tid=824212
